title: Ichabod and Mr Toad
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney, James Algar, Clyde Geronimi and Jack Kinney
brief_description: Contains two classic Disney animated adaptations: Washington Irving’s ‘The Legend of Sleepy Hollow’ and Kenneth Grahame’s ‘The Wind in the willows’. These delightful stories feature the wonderful voices of Bing Crosby (narrator of the Legend of Sleepy Hollow) and Basil Rathbone (narrator of The Wind in the willows) supported by Eric Blore, Pat O’Malley, Colin Campbell, Campbell Grant and others.
